page.title: 02SPORTS CLUBS AND FACILITIES
page.content: Poulton-le-Fylde has various sports facilities. Three cricket clubs are housed within the area,each with their own ground. The Poulton club,shares Cottam Hall Playing Fields with Poulton Football Club,which has the largest Youth section in England.The local Ladies' netball team is also based there. Facilities at Breck Sports Club include Weightlifting, Squash, Aerobics, but membership is required for these activities. The nearby Poulton Recreation Centre has a 22m swimming pool and a 9 hole golf course. There are two private tennis clubs, as well as the Municipal courts in the local park. Other activities in the park are Bowling and Putting. Finally, Baines School field provides a home for the local Womens' Hockey Team.
